name: coin-momentum-screener-ta-fa
description: Coin Momentum Screener with Technical & Fundamental Analysis - Powered by CoinGecko API

scripts.dev:cloudflare: npm run build:client && npx wrangler dev
scripts.install-all: npm install && cd server && npm install && cd ../client && npm install
scripts.cf:deploy: npm run build:client && npx wrangler deploy
